channel.title: Home on TyskTech
channel.description: Recent content in Home on TyskTech

item.title: Digital Assets
item.description: What is the EUDI Wallet? In accordance with the EU regulation 2024/1183, often referred to as “eIDAS 2.0”, all EU member states must provide a European Digital Identity (EUDI) wallet to their citizens by early 2027. Such a wallet will enable citizens to store digital identification documents in the form of so-called credentials and utilize these for various use cases across the EU. Such use cases include (bank) account opening, payment transaction authorization or SIM Card registration.
